New Records: Jayson Tatum now has 11 game-tying or go-ahead shots late since 2020, the most in the NBA.
Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum hit a buzzer-beating game-winner to lift the Celtics past the Raptors in overtime.
Jayson Tatum missed 11 straight game-tying or go-ahead shots in the final 5 seconds of the 4Q/OT before Saturday’s winner over Toronto.
Jakob Poeltl scored 30 points in 26 minutes on 14 for 17 FG, one point short of tying his career high of 31.
Pre-Game Insights: The Toronto Raptors play against the Boston Celtics at TD Garden.
Game Time: 8:00 PM EST on Saturday November 16, 2024.
Broadcast Info: Live Stream: fuboTV, NBA League Pass, Home TV: NBC Sports Boston, Home Radio: 98.5 The Sports Hub.
Post-Match Reflections: Jayson Tatum expressed confidence after hitting the game-winner, stating 'I got a lot of problems in life. Confidence has never been one of them.'
Al Horford thanked Tatum for helping the Celtics avoid a second overtime period, saying 'That wouldn’t have been it.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics unveiled their City Edition jerseys during the game.
The Celtics improved to 11-3 to open the year, matching their start from the 2023-24 season.
